page.title: 07WETHERBY SWIMMING POOL
page.content: Wetherby Swimming Pool has been open for ten years and the present manager has been there since it opened. The pool is very popular and during the week about 2500 people use it. At the weekend an additional 1000 people go swimming. The pool opens 7 days a week between 9am and 7:30pm and then until 10:30pm for swimming clubs. There are 30 sessions of swimming lessons in a week and the youngest toddler swimming is three years old. Twenty eight schools in the area use the swimming pool each week for lessons. There are 9 instructors and they all have very high qualifications. Apart from the pool there is a health suite which has a sauna, a solarium, sunbeds and a gymnasium. Keep-fit classes are also held for both men and women.
